comments.body:
@jsimsa Find another style to declare the static constant name as [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a26d43a5f8e06f5236d4117bbda702fac26ae93a/tensorflow/core/framework/function.h#L318). Using that style, `kDatasetType` can be declared as `static constexpr const char* const kDatasetType = "Concatenate";` and the re-declaration in the .cc file will not be needed. 

Which style do you think is better?
I like the one that does not require .cc re-declaration.
Me too. Will change them in the next PR.
